_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_CLASS_DESCRIPTION_: CSS button class for showing and hiding more text.
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_ICON_LEFT_LESS_DESCRIPT: Left side icon for 'Show less' button.
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_ICON_LEFT_MORE_DESCRIPT: Left side icon for 'Show more' button.
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_ICON_RIGHT_LESS_DESCRIP: Right side icon for 'Show less' button.
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_ICON_RIGHT_MORE_DESCRIP: Right side icon for 'Show more' button.
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_PARENT_CLASS_DESCRIPTIO: CSS class for parent button tag.
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_TITLE_PLACEMENT_DESCRIP: Title placement for the button, only works when is-btn-title-html is true.
_A_SHOW_MORE_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The 'AShowMore' component makes it possible to hide part of the content of a web page and show it when needed.
_A_SHOW_MORE_EXPOSES_IS_OPEN_DESCRIPTION: If the 'Show more' button is clicked, and the entire HTML is visible.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_BTN_CLASS_DESCRIPTION: It is possible to customize CSS for the button and its parent.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_BTN_ICONS_DESCRIPTION: You can customize the icons for the button.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_BTN_TEXT_DESCRIPTION_: It is possible to customize texts for the button.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_BTN_TITLE_DESCRIPTION: An additional information in text form can be displayed when the mouse hovers over the buttons for displaying and hiding more text.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_BTN_TITLE_HTML_DESCRI: An additional information in HTML format can be displayed when the mouse hovers over the buttons for displaying and hiding more text.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION_: Disabled state of AShowMore. The user is not allowed to interact with the component when it is in a disabled state.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_EVENTS_DESCRIPTION_: Emit toggle allows, when changing the status of the component, to call the method with one argument "isOpen", which is an indicator of the open state of the component.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_HEIGHT_DESCRIPTION_: If this height is exceeded, a button will be shown. The unit of measure is pixel.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_HEIGHT_HEADER_: The height of the HTML block
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The content of the component can be defined in HTML format. Sanitization is applied to this content.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_NOT_LESS_DESCRIPTION_: Determines whether, after opening more text, the user would be offered a button to return the component to its closed state.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_OPEN_DEFAULT_DESCRIPT: The component can initially be displayed in an open state.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_OPEN_DEFAULT_HEADER_: All text is displayed by default
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_SAFE_HTML_DESCRIPTION: The content of the component can be defined in safe HTML format. Sanitization is not applied to this content.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_TEXT_DESCRIPTION_: The content of the component can be defined as plain text.
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_TEXT_LENGTH_DESCRIPTI: The length represents the maximum number of characters after which the rest of the text becomes hidden.
_A_SHOW_MORE_HEIGHT_DESCRIPTION_: The height of the HTML block, if this height is exceeded, a button will be shown.
_A_SHOW_MORE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: HTML to be shown inside the component.
_A_SHOW_MORE_IS_BTN_TITLE_HTML_DESCRIPTI: If the title in the HTML format.
_A_SHOW_MORE_IS_OPEN_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: All text is shown by default.
_A_SHOW_MORE_PROPS_BTN_ATTRIBUTES_DESCRI: Button attributes that are not explicitly defined as props.
_A_SHOW_MORE_PROPS_ID_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies a unique ID for the HTML element corresponding to the component.
_A_SHOW_MORE_PROPS_SAFE_HTML_DESCRIPTION: Component content in safe HTML format.
_A_SHOW_MORE_PROPS_TEXT_DESCRIPTION_: Content of the component in plain text format.
_A_SHOW_MORE_SLOT_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION_: Content to be displayed within the component.
_A_SHOW_MORE_TEXT_TOGGLE_WITH_TOGGLE_BUT: Manipulating the component using the "Show more" button.
_A_SHOW_MORE_TOGGLE_DESCRIPTION_: Triggers when a button is pressed, ({ isOpen }) => {}.
